Source.Name: ecl
Source.Summary: ECL is an interpreter of the Common-Lisp language
Source.Description: ECL (Embeddable Common-Lisp) is an interpreter of the Common-Lisp language as described in the X3J13 Ansi specification, featuring CLOS (Common-Lisp Object System), conditions, loops, etc, plus a translator to C, which can produce standalone executables.
